ObjectClass.Name: Subspace Amplifier Relay
ObjectClass.Description:
SUBSPACE AMPLIFIER:
Control 12 Subspace Amplifiers at any point in the past to claim victory Generates 30 P / 60s when under full control + 10 QP / 60s after 300 s

Objective.Name: vendor_idle
Objective.Details: makes unit change alliegences as convenient

Objective.Name: Morph: Reaph
Objective.Details: \Defensive support building\Repairs friendly units and structures\in its vision radius

Objective.Name: Chrono-Disruptor
Objective.Details: Sacrifice this Amplifier Relay to \indefinitely Freeze and TSS-Break a single \target \ \(Can be used to destroy enemy Amplifiers)
